channel.title: Provides supporting educational information; on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Provides supporting educational information; on Climate Tools

item.title: Percent Light at Leaf Calculator
item.description: Developed By: CBP Summary: The Percent Light at Leaf (PLL) calculator can be used to estimate the percentage of light penetrating the water column and reaching submerged aquatic vegetation (SAV) leaf surface at a given depth.

item.title: FloodiQ
item.description: Developed By: First Street Foundation Summary: FloodiQ is a flood risk mapping tool that shows the extent of potential inundation from tidal flooding and hurricane storm surge on the East and Gulf coasts of the U.

item.title: Sea Level Report Cards
item.description: Developed By: VIMS_CCRM Summary: The Sea-Level Report cards provide interactive graphs and narrative descriptions of sea-level trends and projections for 32 coastal locations across the U.
